page.title: 12LEISURE,DUNTISBOURNE AREA
page.content: There is no Leisure Centre but the village halls offer a variety of activities: playgroups,youth clubs, Women's Institutes,Mothers' Unions,Keep Fit,British Legion,etc. The nearest garage on the A417 is also the Centurion Cafe with a small shop. In summer the Cricket Ground is well used."Five Mile House" on the A417 is the only Public House ,five miles from Cirencester.It is very quaint,like walking into someone's living room.There are 2 rooms ,one of which has large oak settles for seating. Most young people are involved in country pursuits like horse-riding, animals and walking.Gardening seems to be the most popular hobby with the older inhabitants.
